caption.p: Scanning electron microscopy (SEM) images of the films cross-section (left) and top view (right) of poly(3-hydroxybutyrate- co-3-hydroxyvalerate) (PHBV)/Mobil Composition of Matter (MCM)-41 with eugenol: ( a, b) 2.5 wt.-% MCM-41 + eugenol; ( c, d) 5 wt.-% MCM-41 + eugenol; ( e, f) 7.5 wt.-% MCM-41 + eugenol; ( g, h) 10 wt.-% MCM-41 + eugenol; ( k, j) 15 wt.-% MCM-41 + eugenol; ( k, l) 20 wt.-% MCM-41 + eugenol. Scale markers of 50 µm and 100 µm.
